attributes.action: No Confidence in the Coalition Government (Petrol Crisis)
attributes.additional_details: In light of the bungling ineptitude with which the Coalition Government has handled the Fuel Crisis, causing widespread obstruction of our roads, sporadic public disorder, encouraging illegal and extremely unsafe transporting and storage of fuel, we the undersigned instruct The House to move a Motion of NO CONFIDENCE in the Coalition Government and call for a General Election at earliest opportunity.
